nextcloud_create_event.description:
Create a new event in a Nextcloud calendar.

    ⚠️ TEMPORAL CHECK: Verify year in start_datetime matches current year
    from system date. LLMs often default to training-data years (2023/2024).

    Supports regular events and all-day events. Times are interpreted
    in the specified timezone (defaults to Australia/Sydney).

    Args:
        params: CreateEventInput containing:
            - calendar_name: Calendar to create event in
            - summary: Event title
            - start_datetime: Start time (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM)
            - end_datetime: End time (optional, defaults to +1 hour)
            - description: Event description (optional)
            - location: Event location (optional)
            - all_day: Create as all-day event
            - timezone: Timezone for times

    Returns:
        Confirmation with the new event's UID.
